title: Black and female
description: In these essays, the award-winning writer dissects the nervous condition of being not only black, and not only a woman, but also "postcolonial". Weaving together the experiences, events, intersections, and negotiations of her multifaceted identity, Dangarembga offers a powerful vision of Black liberation. Winner of the Peace Prize of the German Book Trade 2021.
author: Tsitsi Dangarembga
